name: Car Serial No for Sales
query:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT sales_person as SalesPerson, reserved_by_document as BookReference, purchase_date as DateOfPurchase , purchase_document_no AS PINVNo, supplier as Supplier, warehouse as Warehouse,purchase_rate as PurchaseRate, reservation_status as Status, serial_no as SerialNo, TS.item_name as ItemName, TI.variant_of AS Brand,
TI.item_group AS ItemGroup, MAX(IF (TVA.attribute ='Color',TVA.attribute_value,'')) AS Color,MAX(IF (TVA.attribute ='model',TVA.attribute_value,'')) AS Model, MAX(IF (TVA.attribute ='Category',TVA.attribute_value,'')) AS Category
FROM `tabSerial No` AS TS inner join tabItem AS TI ON TS.item_code = TI.item_code INNER JOIN  `tabItem Variant Attribute` AS TVA ON TVA.parent = TI.item_code group by sales_person, reserved_by_document, purchase_date, purchase_document_no, supplier, warehouse, purchase_rate, reservation_status, serial_no, TS.item_name, TI.variant_of, TI.item_group) T
